contexts.context: ...and the UK, but I also regularly shoot <mark>elsewhere</mark> in Europe, Africa, and Asia. Citation...
...so much transformed as transmogrified as I have argued <mark>elsewhere</mark>, that is, metamorphosed constantly, its strangeness repeatedly...
